sentences.sContent: They could afford a secondhand car, she thought.
sentences.sCn: 他们能买得起一辆二手车，她想。

sentences.sContent: I only heard about it secondhand.
sentences.sCn: 我只间接听说了这件事。

synos.tran: 二手的；旧的；间接获得的；做旧货生意的
间接地；间接听来；以旧货

trans.tranCn: 二手的；旧的；间接获得的；做旧货生意的
trans.tranOther: Secondhand things are not new and have been owned by someone else

trans.tranCn: 间接地；间接听来；以旧货
